metadata.title: CVE-2024-23213 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin watchOS 10.3, tvOS 17.3, iOS 17.3 and iPadOS 17.3, macOS Sonoma 14.3,iOS 16.7.5 and iPadOS 16.7.5, Safari 17.3. Processing web content may leadto arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
